replacement.value:
This template demonstrates how the internal key of the M-209 can be set by entering it on the input 'Input internal key' of the M-209 component. The format of the internal key, as seen above, is a comma-separated list of the effective pins for the rotors followed by the lug positions for the 27 bars.\r\n\r\n
In the given example, the first rotor has the effective pins B, C, E, J, O, P, S, T, U, V, X and Y. The first bar has one lug on position 1 and the other lug on the neutral position. On the last bar, the lugs are on positions 4 and 5.
